overview: Film pictures job interview, which happened to catch the main hero in the period of emotional instability. Anton comes to apply for the screenwriter position to the TV production company. Chief editor Viktoria asks Anton to tell a story as a test task. Since Anton is currently experiencing a painful existential crisis, he finds even more painful to represent himself. Anton's stories sound irrelevant. He can't tell the line between honesty and provocation and the interview becomes more and more alike confession or a one-man's show.
title: Young But It Will Pass
